name: VidCutter
tagline: Cross-platform Qt5 based app for quick and easy video trimming/splitting and merging/joining for simple quick edits. FFmpeg based backend, which is supplied for Windows, and written in Python3 & the excellent PyQt5 GUI framework. Nearing first phase of completion.
body:
VidCutter

Cross-platform Qt5 based app for quick and easy video trimming/splitting and merging/joining for simple quick edits. FFmpeg based backend, which is supplied for Windows, and written in Python3 with the excellent PyQt5 GUI framework. Nearing first phase of completion.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
